name: One Gold Key
description:
You will have to find the key in a big level and be careful not to die! If you do, you will have to start over again! 

Features cool weapons, HP potions and more!
There are some secret places on the levels, can you find them and the key?

Features big big BIG levels that build to be like a maze - so you should be busy with finding the key first! (watch out for clues)

Features really cool music and sound FX!

Features cool robots, zombies, and more animations!

Features artificial intelligence that WILL try to kill you! WATCH OUT!

You can kill or avoid enemies, but will you survive?
